channel.title: Starting development Team PvPscapez
channel.description:
Starting developement team Basicly using the source PI With 508 maps So far what i have done is
changed the xp rate Fixing up shops added ::mypos (wasnt working)
- Alex - 11/20/2012
trying to add features to neitznot but its hard because i cant find the actionbutton id
Added "getid" command use as ::getid dragon claw and the id of the claws will come up in the chatbox
added ::bank command :l was testing skills firmaking seem to dc the server edited some shops not anything big though.
made an advanced mining area/ click on smithing teleport then follow the path east until you get to a ladder :)
- Alex - 11/21/2012
-------- added mystery box
- Alex
90% finished frost dragons (might want to finish some drop) -Alex
added skills quickchat
-Alex
Going to be messing around with monster drops (mostly lower level npcs)
- Alex - 11/21/2012
----------------------------------- added all npc's needed for slayer - zak
- Alex - 11/23/2012
added godwars and all working doors--------------------------Alex.
Worked on Godwars Added Yak drops Added Hill Giants + Hill Giant Drops General Brain storming lol Added "The Green Room" (imo looks so loveing dope lul) Tested pking... again.. looks so loveing dope - Alex - 11/23/2012
11/23 changed some of the rewards for mysterbox - Alex re done slayer! :D - Alex added max cape server sided, with all the stats. - Alex made alot of items non tradeable, kiln, max cape, defenders, etc. - Alex took out spiritshields, bandos, claws, godswords, armadyl set out of pk shop - Alex Added Zaryte Bow - Alex Added reqs to Zaryte bow - Alex
11/24 made it so the skillcape shop wont freeze your client any more - Alex not very important, but i added fully working christmas crackers, will release these on christmas
__________________________________________________
Added an Amazing Vote shop :) Finally got Zaryte Bow working :) - Alex - 11/25/2012
- Alex 11/25 added the titles "Hybrid" & "Nasty Thoughts" Added Nex
__________________________________________________
Added thzaar city Npcs + Drops Added Corp Added Armadyl Battle staff and SOA Fixed the slayer tower npcs Added Brimhaven npcs + Drops - Alex - 11/26/2012
__________________________________________________
Added Runecrafting my way (The Boss Way) spawn 8013 or buy from a general store oh and also rune ess to start. - Alex - 11/26/2012
11/26 Alex got rid of those spider webs on the spirit shields. added all the npcs for godwars dungeon
___________________________________________________
10/27/2012
- Alex - added the 4 other skills tried changing their colour but couldnt.
- Alex Changed where nex was made him hit high just needs a different attack style jamo when you see this could you add range and mage to him??
-made us a webclient http://www.pvpscapez.com
- gave mystery box real items - Alex
11/28/2012
- Alex -
Added npc slayer dialogue not finished
Fixed 6 dupes
11/29/2012 - Alex fixed 1 more dupe
11/29 started a npc to give max cape, used nastroth - Alex 11/31 made it so you have to have a certain range req for dragon hide chaps - Alex
11/29/2012
-alex added a supply store everyone was requesting it also finished the prices.
-alex redone the pk point system more/shorter code less memory also changed pk point shop dialogue dunno if it worked cause the server hasnt been updated. also added some items to it what the people wanted
11/29/2012
added more content to donator zone brawling gloves made a new boss the bunnies made a way to tele to them at dz add dialouge for the npc that gives u max cape
11/30/2012 added td's to brim dung
_____________________________________________________________________
11/30/2012 (Alex)
fixed vesta spears attack animation Comp cape now acts as ava's accumulator made the gravite weapons untradble and sellable fixed kick command (it didnt work at all) fixed xteletome command (some1 made it only mods could do so made it mod+) made a tokkul store to buy kiln cape Slightly increased rare drops for tzhaar monsters (took ages to get fury)
_____________________________________________________________________
11/30/2012 (Alex) made mass vote work, pretty sure you do ::massvote and the window pops up for all our players. mute should work now, i took it straight out of a diffrent server that i knew mute worked
11/30/2012 (Alex)
Added fully working chaos tunnels now working on The npc drops in there.
11/30/2012 (Alex)
Rewrote Chaos Tunnels Npcs Crashed server Fixing now.
11/30/2012 (Alex) Fixed Npc's Crashing servers Chaos tunnels Fixed.
12/1/2012 (Alex) Added player clipping
12/3/2012 (Alex) Rewrote player clipping Nulled context menu's
12/3/2012 (Alex) fixed the context menu's so thier not nulled
Msn/Skype:Proof of Work(links, projects, etc...):How many hours a day can you work?:Why should I consider you:Anything else?:Do you accept Tos?(Auto decline if not):
Tos: -If I get access to the source I will NOT release the source to anyone. -If i get access to the source I will NOT release content in the source to anyone. -I will send a pm to Kidgoku4522 or kjhq22 agreeing to the tos after applying on the thread so he has a picuture of you agreeing to the tos. -I agree to Tos check yes or no. Yes [] or No [].
To Apply: -You must have proof of work. -You must have skype. -You must have some knowledgeable in java or in web development depending on what you are applying for. -Have spare time to work on the server.

item.title: Starting development Team PvPscapez
item.dc:creator: @dark_s dark s
item.description:
@dark_s wrote:

can i help please?

Read full topic
